member.summary: Gets the next observed date for this holiday.

member.summary: Gets the next observed date for this holiday by index.
member.param: A value the indicates the nth occurrence where 0 is the next occurrence.
member.returns: The date of the nth occurrence of this holiday.

member.summary: Gets the observed date of this holiday in any specified year.

member.returns: The date of the occurrence of this holiday in the specified year.
